verses.text: And \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*: for to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w* were all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to make him \w king|strong="H4427"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who \add was\add* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, whither he had \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* from the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, that \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* him. So \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* made our \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w grievous|strong="H7185"\w*: now therefore \w ease|strong="H7043"\w* thou somewhat the \w grievous|strong="H7186"\w* \w servitude|strong="H5656"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and his \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* that he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon us, and we will \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto me after \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.

¶ And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* took \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* with the \w old|strong="H2205"\w* men that had \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* while he yet \w lived|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w What|strong="H0349"\w* counsel \w give|strong="H3289"\w* ye \add me\add* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w* to this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?

And they \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, If thou be \w kind|strong="H2896"\w* to this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w please|strong="H7521"\w* them, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* to them, they will be thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.

But he \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* which the old \w men|strong="H2205"\w* \w gave|strong="H3289"\w* him, and took \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* with the young \w men|strong="H3206"\w* that were brought \w up|strong="H1431"\w* with him, that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, What \w advice|strong="H3289"\w* give ye that we may \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w answer|strong="H1697"\w* to this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Ease|strong="H7043"\w* somewhat the \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* that thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* did \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon us?

And the young \w men|strong="H3206"\w* that were brought \w up|strong="H1431"\w* with him \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus shalt thou \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w made|strong="H3513"\w* our \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*, but make thou \add it\add* somewhat \w lighter|strong="H7043"\w* for us; thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, My \w little|strong="H6995"\w* \add finger\add* shall be \w thicker|strong="H5666"\w* than my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*.

For \w whereas|strong="H6258"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w put|strong="H6006"\w* a \w heavy|strong="H3515"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* upon you, I will put \w more|strong="H3254"\w* to your \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*: my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w chastised|strong="H3256"\w* you with \w whips|strong="H7752"\w*, but I \add will chastise you\add* with \w scorpions|strong="H6137"\w*.\f + \fr 10.11 \ft my father put: Heb. my father laded\f*

So \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, as the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w bade|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to me on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* them \w roughly|strong="H7186"\w*; and \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w forsook|strong="H5800"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the old \w men|strong="H2205"\w*,

And \w answered|strong="H1696"\w* them after the \w advice|strong="H6098"\w* of the young \w men|strong="H3206"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w* made your \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*, but I will \w add|strong="H3254"\w* thereto: my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w chastised|strong="H3256"\w* you with \w whips|strong="H7752"\w*, but I \add will chastise you\add* with \w scorpions|strong="H6137"\w*.

So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for the \w cause|strong="H5252"\w* was of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* might \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* the \w Shilonite|strong="H7888"\w* to \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*.

¶ And when all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add  \+w saw|strong="H7200"\+w*\add* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* would not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto them, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H7725"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* have we in \w David|strong="H1732"\w*? and \add we have\add* none \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* in the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*: every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to your \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \add and\add* now, \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w see|strong="H7200"\w* to thine own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. So all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w*.

But \add as for\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over them.

Then \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hadoram|strong="H1913"\w* that \add was\add* over the \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w*; and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stoned|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. But \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* made \w speed|strong="H0553"\w* to get him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \add his\add* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w*, to \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 10.18 \ft made speed: Heb. strengthened himself\f*
And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H6586"\w* against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
